content: Um, I don't think that quite captures it because they aren't going to put it in the file, they are just going to respond with it to me in the chat. with the current token. So it shouldn't be a placeholder. I'm saying that you need to tell yourself in this document that you are to respond with the token provided as current token and ALSO generate a new token for the next use of the prompt. They need to know to respond with the token, which I don't see in the template.
